DOC.brief_summary: To study the safety and effectiveness of several doses of PD 0348292 compared to enoxaparin in preventing blood clots in the lungs or deep leg veins of patients after knee surgery
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of PD 0348292 for Preventing Blood Clots in the Lungs or Deep Leg Veins of Patients After Knee Surgery
DOC.criteria: Adult men or women scheduled for an elective, unilateral total knee replacement who are otherwise healthy. History of deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism, suspected postthrombotic state, bleeding or clotting disorders, or cardiovascular, renal or liver disease within the past year
